fields.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.description: A creamy and delicious pasta dish from Italy.
fields.ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan cheese, Pancetta, Black pepper
fields.steps: 1. Boil pasta. 2. Cook pancetta until crispy. 3. Mix eggs with Parmesan. 4. Combine and serve.

fields.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
fields.description: A popular Indian curry dish with grilled marinated chicken.
fields.ingredients: Chicken, Yogurt, Garlic, Ginger, Spices, Tomatoes, Cream
fields.steps: 1. Marinate chicken. 2. Grill until charred. 3. Prepare sauce. 4. Simmer chicken in sauce and serve.

fields.title: Beef Stroganoff
fields.description: A classic Russian dish with tender beef strips and a creamy mushroom sauce.
fields.ingredients: Beef, Mushrooms, Onion, Garlic, Sour cream, Beef broth
fields.steps: 1. Sear beef strips. 2. Sauté mushrooms and onions. 3. Add beef broth and reduce. 4. Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles.

fields.title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
fields.description: A quick and nutritious breakfast option with creamy avocado and a perfectly poached egg.
fields.ingredients: Bread, Avocado, Egg, Salt, Pepper, Lemon juice
fields.steps: 1. Toast bread. 2. Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. 3. Spread avocado on toast. 4. Top with a poached egg.

fields.title: French Onion Soup
fields.description: A comforting French soup with caramelized onions, beef broth, and melted cheese.
fields.ingredients: Onions, Butter, Beef broth, French bread, Gruyere cheese
fields.steps: 1. Caramelize onions in butter. 2. Add beef broth and simmer. 3. Pour soup into bowls. 4. Top with bread and cheese, broil until melted.

fields.title: Sushi Rolls
fields.description: Homemade sushi rolls with fresh ingredients and customizable fillings.
fields.ingredients: Sushi rice, Nori sheets, Cucumber, Avocado, Salmon, Soy sauce
fields.steps: 1. Prepare sushi rice. 2. Place rice on nori. 3. Add fillings and roll. 4. Slice and serve with soy sauce.

fields.title: Tacos al Pastor
fields.description: Traditional Mexican tacos with marinated pork and pineapple.
fields.ingredients: Pork, Pineapple, Onion, Cilantro, Corn tortillas, Lime
fields.steps: 1. Marinate pork with spices. 2. Grill with pineapple. 3. Slice and serve on tortillas with toppings.

fields.title: Mushroom Risotto
fields.description: A creamy Italian rice dish made with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
fields.ingredients: Arborio rice, Mushrooms, Onion, Garlic, Parmesan, White wine
fields.steps: 1.Sauté onions and mushrooms. 2. Add rice and wine. 3. Gradually add broth, stirring until creamy. 4. Stir in Parmesan and serve.
